Practice Details File Path

Source: R/get_practice_details_path.R
get_practice_details_path.Rd

Get the path to the Practice Details file

Usage

get_practice_details_path(update = latest_update(), ...)

Arguments

update

the update month (defaults to use latest_update())

...

additional arguments passed to get_file_path()

Value

The path to the Practice Details file as an fs::path()

See also

get_file_path() for the generic function.

Other file path functions: get_dd_path(), get_demographic_cohorts_path(), get_file_path(), get_homelessness_completeness_path(), get_ltcs_path(), get_nsu_path(), get_readcode_lookup_path(), get_service_use_cohorts_path(), get_sg_homelessness_pub_path()
